overview_of_class: This class looks at the way people think about mathematical infinity. Topics include Galileo's Paradox, differences in the sizes of infinite sets, and ordinal numbers. The topics also include how children learn about the infinity of the positive integers and children's and adults' mistakes in reasoning about infinity.
